articles.author: Michael Rudling
articles.title: Romelu Lukaku SLAMMED by fans after Champions League defeat to Man City - Daily Mail
articles.description: Romelu Lukaku has been heavily criticised online after a poor performance for Inter Milan in the Champions League final.
articles.content:
Romelu Lukaku has been heavily criticised online after a poor performance for Inter Milan in the Champions League final.
Man Citywon the final 1-0 thanks to an excellent goal from Rodri, completing … [+1796 chars]
